root.name: Rocketbirds 2: Evolution
root.description: This game was first revealed under the extras menu of Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken on the Vita. Several pieces of concept art were shown in a slideshow including owls described as "transdimentional space owls" and new vehicles. In an interview Ratloop Asia developer Sian Yue Tan revealed that his team had received PS4 development kits in January and have been hard at work on Rocketbirds 2: Evolution for the PlayStation 4.
